Class Movie

Object
Movie
public class Movie extends Object
Movie class representing movie instances

2022-11-11

    Constructors
    Constructor

    Movie(File movFile)
    Constructs Movie object given the data stored in a text file Assumes text file is properly formatted; text files can only be accessed by the MovieList and Movie classes to maintain proper formatting

    Constructs Movie class from user input Used to define a new movie not recorded in the movie list

  • Constructor Details

    • Movie

      Movie(File movFile) throws Exception
      Constructs Movie object given the data stored in a text file Assumes text file is properly formatted; text files can only be accessed by the MovieList and Movie classes to maintain proper formatting
      Parameters:
      movFile - Text file's filepath
      Throws:
      Exception

    • Movie

      Movie(String title, Scanner sc)
      Constructs Movie class from user input Used to define a new movie not recorded in the movie list
      Parameters:
      title - Movie title
      sc - Scanner to read user input
